data.title: Phuket, Krabi, Bangkok – ( 6N and 7D )
data.itinerary:
Day 1: Bangkok Phuket International Airport –Transfer to Phuket Hotel

Welcome to Phuket, after reaching Bangkok Phuket International Airport. Meet by local guide/rep after immigration and customs clearance. Transfer to Phuket Overnight in Phuket. Rest of the day is free. 


Day 02: Phuket Phi Phi Island Tour

After breakfast (08:00 – 09:00), pick up from the hotel and transfer to the pier. Depart for Phi Phi Islands at 10:00. Visit Monkey Beach at 11:00, Phi Phi Ley at 11:30 – 12:15 (swimming and snorkeling at Maya Bay). Discover Lho Sa Mah Bay and Pi Leh Cove from 13:00 – 13:45. Sightseeing at Viking Cave at 13:45 – 14:00. Stop at Laemtong Beach for buffet lunch and free time (14:00 – 15:15). Depart for Hin Klang at 15:15, Bamboo Island at 15:45, and Khai Nai Island at 16:15. Return to the Boat Lagoon Marina by 17:00 and transfer back to the hotel by 17:30.

Food: Breakfast: Yes, Lunch: Yes, Dinner: No.


Day 03: Phuket Hotelto Transfer Krabi Hotel 

Phuket –Krabi Breakfast at the hotel. Check out and transfer to Krabi by Boat. 4 island tour Krabi. Overnight in Krabi

Food: Breakfast: Yes, Lunch: No, Dinner: No

Day 04: Krabi 4 Island Tour (Krabi)

Just off the coast of Krabi at Ao Nang, the 4 Islands are the best and the most convenient way to get a true idea of what a tropical Island is. If you only visit one place in Krabi, these Islands must be at the top of the list. The Four Krabi Islands are Phranang, Tup Island, Chicken Island, and Poda Island

Inclusions: Longtail boat to 4 Islands, Lunch

Day 05: Krabi Airport – Bangkok Airport - Bangkok Hotel Transfer

Breakfast at Krabi Hotel. Check out from the hotel. Our driver will pick you up in plenty of time to drop you at the airport for your flight to Bangkok. On arrival at Don Mueang/Suvarnabhumi International Airport, you will be transferred to your hotel.  The rest of the day is for your own purpose. 

Day 06: Bangkok City Tour - Golden Buddha Temple + Marble Temple

Breakfast at the hotel then Pick up from your hotel to visit the Temple tour with Golden Buddha Temple and Marble Temple:

Golden Buddha Temple: Wat Traimit Witthayaram or the Temple of the Golden Buddha stands at the junction of Traimit, Yaowarat, and Charoen Krung Roads. Just across from the main entrance of Wat Traimit is the Odeon Circle and the archway to Chinatown Bangkok. The Golden Buddha is 3.98 m high and 3.13 m wide from knee to knee. It’s cast in solid gold weighing 5 tons! The statue has a very unusual history.

Marble Temple: Often referred to as the “marble temple” in guidebooks, this architectural gem features a magnificent Buddha image, which is a copy of the highly revered Phra Buddhajinaraja, and a beautiful beamed ceiling in a dark red and gold. Back in the hotel and Overnight in Bangkok

Food: Breakfast: Yes, Lunch: No, Dinner: No

Day 07: Bangkok Airport - Depart flight to Dhaka

Have breakfast at the hotel and be ready to fly to Dhaka. Our driver will pick you up in plenty of time to drop you at the airport for your flight. Food: Breakfast: Yes, Lunch: No, Dinner: No
data.cancellation_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Your confirmation of the Holiday will ensure that you have read the Cancellation Policy thoroughly and accepted it.

15 days prior to the travel date - 50 % of total holiday cost.

10 days prior to the travel date - 75 % of total holiday cost.

05 days prior to the travel date   - 100% of holiday cost will be non-refundable.

include_services.title: Meal Included as per our itinerary
Evening Dinner Cruise by Chao Princess Cruise on SIC Basis
Airport to Hotel transfers on private Basis
All Tours and sightseeing as per the itinerary.

exclude_services.title: Any meals are other than those mentioned in Menu.
Any portage at border and hotels, tips, insurance, wine, mineral water, telephone charges, and all items of personal nature.
Expenses caused by factors beyond our control like rail and flight delays, roadblocks, and vehicle mal-functions, political disturbances etc.
Any services not specifically mentioned in the inclusions.
If City / Resort Fees / Tourist taxes are applicable then the same will be Payable directly at hotel /Apartment.
